section.title: Environment variables for configuration
section.simpara: Scaffolded apps are preconfigured to support these environment variables :

listitem.simpara: YESOD_HOST : Host/interface the server should bind to.
YESOD_IP_FROM_HEADER : Get the IP address from the header when logging. Useful when sitting behind a reverse proxy.

section.simpara: They are listed in file /config/settings.yml, where their default values can be defined. Other variables can be added by uncommenting dedicated lines :

listitem.simpara: YESOD_APPROOT : Explicit base for all generated URLs.
